alert.note: Alert for Deaf Smith; Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 2:03AM CDT until July 15 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Randall County in the Panhandle of Texas... Eastern Deaf Smith County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southwestern Potter County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 203 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Wildorado, or 16 miles northwest of Canyon, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Canyon, Mescalero Park, Buffalo Lake, Bushland, Dawn and Umbarger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
